articles.title: Sahpra reassures SA on safety of vaccines, says 29 deaths not linked to jabs - Eyewitness News
articles.description: The South African Health Products Regulatory Authority has so far investigated 29 deaths that occurred shortly after people received a COVID-19 vaccine shot. Following rigorous investigations SAHPRA has been unable to link any of these deaths to the vaccines.
